item.description:
Join us at the Lansdowne Pub for our 4th annual Halloween Week Blowout. The party lasts for 3 days and will be filled with Boston's best cover bands, costume contests, giveaways & more!

Fri 10/26: Boston Common Band
Sat 10/26: Guzzle
Wed 10/31: Bearfight

Email mharrell@lyonsgroup.com for group reservations

21+
item.name: Lansdowne Pub Halloween Week Blowout
